name: Maruti Suzuki Ignis
description: Is Maruti Ignis a failure . Ignis was a staggering failure for the company last month. Maruti's hatchback offering sold 964 units in December 2019, but that number dropped to zero in January. India's biggest carmaker failed to sell a single unit of Ignis.
